content.question: The political arrangements shown on Map 2 were largely undone in the mid-twentieth century, primarily as a result of

choices.label: diplomatic pressure from the Soviet Union and the United States during the early stages of the Cold War
increasing resistance by independence movements and the economic costs of the First and Second World Wars
the industrialization and economic development of large parts of Africa
the efforts of the United Nations to implement the Mandate System

content.answer: increasing resistance by independence movements and the economic costs of the First and Second World Wars

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
